trans-unit.source: Manage infrastructure capacity
trans-unit.target: Manage infrastructure capacity

trans-unit.source: Learn about using the Capacity Planning solution in Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Learn about using the Capacity Planning solution in Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure

trans-unit.source: Manage infrastructure capacity
trans-unit.target: Manage infrastructure capacity

trans-unit.source: You can use the Capacity Planning solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Capacity Planning solution in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to help you understand the capacity of your server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and the base configuration module in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: You install the solution to update the Operations Manager agent and the base configuration module in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: The solution reads performance counters on the monitored server and sends usage data to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.
trans-unit.target: The solution reads performance counters on the monitored server and sends usage data to the Operational Insights service in the cloud for processing.

trans-unit.source: Logic is applied to the usage data, and the cloud service records the data.
trans-unit.target: Logic is applied to the usage data, and the cloud service records the data.

trans-unit.source: Over time, usage patterns are identified and capacity is projected, based on current consumption.
trans-unit.target: Over time, usage patterns are identified and capacity is projected, based on current consumption.

trans-unit.source: For example, a projection might identify when additional processor cores or additional memory will be needed for an individual server.
trans-unit.target: For example, a projection might identify when additional processor cores or additional memory will be needed for an individual server.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the projection might indicate that in 30 days the server will need additional memory.
trans-unit.target: In this example, the projection might indicate that in 30 days the server will need additional memory.

trans-unit.source: This can help you plan for a memory upgrade during the server’s next maintenance window, which might occur once every two weeks.
trans-unit.target: This can help you plan for a memory upgrade during the server’s next maintenance window, which might occur once every two weeks.

trans-unit.source: Capacity Management dashboard
trans-unit.target: Capacity Management dashboard

trans-unit.source: Before you can use the Capacity Management dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.
trans-unit.target: Before you can use the Capacity Management dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights, you must have the solution installed.

trans-unit.source: To read more about installing solutions, see [Use the Solution Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).
trans-unit.target: To read more about installing solutions, see [Use the Solution Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).

trans-unit.source: After the Capacity Planning solution is installed, you can view the capacity of your monitored servers by using the **Capacity Planning** tile on the **Overview** page in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: After the Capacity Planning solution is installed, you can view the capacity of your monitored servers by using the **Capacity Planning** tile on the **Overview** page in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: image of Capacity Planning tile
trans-unit.target: image of Capacity Planning tile

trans-unit.source: The tile opens the **Capacity Management** dashboard where you can view a summary of your server capacity.
trans-unit.target: The tile opens the **Capacity Management** dashboard where you can view a summary of your server capacity.

trans-unit.source: The page displays the following tiles that you can click:
trans-unit.target: The page displays the following tiles that you can click:

trans-unit.source: *Virtual machine count*: Shows the number of days remaining for the capacity of virtual machines
trans-unit.target: *Virtual machine count*: Shows the number of days remaining for the capacity of virtual machines

trans-unit.source: *Compute*: Shows processor cores and available memory
trans-unit.target: *Compute*: Shows processor cores and available memory

trans-unit.source: *Storage*: Shows the disk space used and average disk latency
trans-unit.target: *Storage*: Shows the disk space used and average disk latency

trans-unit.source: *Search*: The data explorer that you can use to Search for any data in the Operational Insights system
trans-unit.target: *Search*: The data explorer that you can use to Search for any data in the Operational Insights system

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] To view capacity management data, you must enable Operations Manager connectivity with Virtual Machine Manager (VMM).

trans-unit.source: For additional information about connecting the systems, see How to connect VMM with Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about connecting the systems, see How to connect VMM with Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: image of Capacity Management dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Capacity Management dashboard

trans-unit.source: To view a capacity page
trans-unit.target: To view a capacity page

trans-unit.source: On the **Overview** page, click **Capacity Management**, and then click **Compute** or **Storage**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Overview** page, click **Capacity Management**, and then click **Compute** or **Storage**.

trans-unit.source: Compute page
trans-unit.target: Compute page

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Compute** dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to view capacity information about utilization, projected days of capacity, and efficiency related to your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Compute** dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to view capacity information about utilization, projected days of capacity, and efficiency related to your infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: You use the **Utilization** area to view CPU core and memory utilization in your virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: You use the **Utilization** area to view CPU core and memory utilization in your virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: You can use the projection tool to estimate how much capacity is expected to be available for a given date range.
trans-unit.target: You can use the projection tool to estimate how much capacity is expected to be available for a given date range.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Efficiency** area to see how efficient your virtual machine hosts are.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Efficiency** area to see how efficient your virtual machine hosts are.

trans-unit.source: You can view details about linked items by clicking them.
trans-unit.target: You can view details about linked items by clicking them.

trans-unit.source: You can generate an Excel workbook for the following categories:
trans-unit.target: You can generate an Excel workbook for the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Top hosts with highest core utilization
trans-unit.target: Top hosts with highest core utilization

trans-unit.source: Top hosts with highest memory utilization
trans-unit.target: Top hosts with highest memory utilization

trans-unit.source: Top hosts with inefficient virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Top hosts with inefficient virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Top hosts by utilization
trans-unit.target: Top hosts by utilization

trans-unit.source: Bottom hosts by utilization
trans-unit.target: Bottom hosts by utilization

trans-unit.source: image of Capacity Management Compute page
trans-unit.target: image of Capacity Management Compute page

trans-unit.source: The following areas are shown on the **Compute** dashboard:
trans-unit.target: The following areas are shown on the **Compute** dashboard:

trans-unit.source: **Utilization**: View CPU core and memory utilization in your virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: **Utilization**: View CPU core and memory utilization in your virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: *Used Cores*: Sum for all hosts (% of the CPU utilized multiplied by the number of physical cores on host).
trans-unit.target: *Used Cores*: Sum for all hosts (% of the CPU utilized multiplied by the number of physical cores on host).

trans-unit.source: *Free Cores*: Total physical cores minus used cores.
trans-unit.target: *Free Cores*: Total physical cores minus used cores.

trans-unit.source: *Percentage Cores Available*: Free physical cores divided by total number of physical cores.
trans-unit.target: *Percentage Cores Available*: Free physical cores divided by total number of physical cores.

trans-unit.source: *Virtual Cores per VM*: Total virtual cores in the system divided by the total number of virtual machines in the system.
trans-unit.target: *Virtual Cores per VM*: Total virtual cores in the system divided by the total number of virtual machines in the system.

trans-unit.source: *Virtual Cores to Physical Cores Ratio*: Ratio of total physical cores to physical cores that are used by virtual machines in the system.
trans-unit.target: *Virtual Cores to Physical Cores Ratio*: Ratio of total physical cores to physical cores that are used by virtual machines in the system.

trans-unit.source: *Number of virtual Cores Available*: Virtual core to physical cores ratio multiplied by the available physical cores.
trans-unit.target: *Number of virtual Cores Available*: Virtual core to physical cores ratio multiplied by the available physical cores.

trans-unit.source: *Used Memory*: Sum of memory that is utilized by all hosts.
trans-unit.target: *Used Memory*: Sum of memory that is utilized by all hosts.

trans-unit.source: *Free Memory*: Total physical memory minus used memory.
trans-unit.target: *Free Memory*: Total physical memory minus used memory.

trans-unit.source: *Percentage Memory Available*: Free physical memory divided by total physical memory.
trans-unit.target: *Percentage Memory Available*: Free physical memory divided by total physical memory.

trans-unit.source: *Virtual Memory per VM*: Total virtual memory in the system divided by the total number of virtual machines in the system.
trans-unit.target: *Virtual Memory per VM*: Total virtual memory in the system divided by the total number of virtual machines in the system.

trans-unit.source: *Virtual Memory to Physical Memory Ratio*: Total virtual memory in the system divided by the total physical memory in the system.
trans-unit.target: *Virtual Memory to Physical Memory Ratio*: Total virtual memory in the system divided by the total physical memory in the system.

trans-unit.source: *Virtual Memory Available*: Virtual memory to physical memory ratio multiplied by the available physical memory.
trans-unit.target: *Virtual Memory Available*: Virtual memory to physical memory ratio multiplied by the available physical memory.

trans-unit.source: Projection tool
trans-unit.target: Projection tool

trans-unit.source: By using the projection tool, you can view historical trends for your resource utilization.
trans-unit.target: By using the projection tool, you can view historical trends for your resource utilization.

trans-unit.source: This includes the usage trends for virtual machines, memory, core, and storage.
trans-unit.target: This includes the usage trends for virtual machines, memory, core, and storage.

trans-unit.source: The projection capability uses a projection algorithm to help you know when you are running out of each of the resources.
trans-unit.target: The projection capability uses a projection algorithm to help you know when you are running out of each of the resources.

trans-unit.source: This helps you calculate proper capacity planning so that you can know when you need to purchase more capacity (such as memory, cores, or storage).
trans-unit.target: This helps you calculate proper capacity planning so that you can know when you need to purchase more capacity (such as memory, cores, or storage).

trans-unit.source: Efficiency
trans-unit.target: Efficiency

trans-unit.source: *Idle VM*: Using less than 10% of the CPU and 10% memory for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: *Idle VM*: Using less than 10% of the CPU and 10% memory for the specified time period.

trans-unit.source: *Overutilized VM*: Using more than 90% of the CPU and 90% memory for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: *Overutilized VM*: Using more than 90% of the CPU and 90% memory for the specified time period.

trans-unit.source: *Idle Host*: Using less than 10% of the CPU and 10% memory for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: *Idle Host*: Using less than 10% of the CPU and 10% memory for the specified time period.

trans-unit.source: *Overutilized Host*: Using more than 90% of the CPU and 90% memory for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: *Overutilized Host*: Using more than 90% of the CPU and 90% memory for the specified time period.

trans-unit.source: To work with items on the Compute page
trans-unit.target: To work with items on the Compute page

trans-unit.source: On the **Compute** dashboard, in the **Utilization** area, view capacity information about the CPU cores and memory in use.
trans-unit.target: On the **Compute** dashboard, in the **Utilization** area, view capacity information about the CPU cores and memory in use.

trans-unit.source: Click an item to open it in the **Search** page and view detailed information about it.
trans-unit.target: Click an item to open it in the **Search** page and view detailed information about it.

trans-unit.source: In the **Projection** tool, move the date slider to display a projection of the capacity that will be used on the date you choose.
trans-unit.target: In the **Projection** tool, move the date slider to display a projection of the capacity that will be used on the date you choose.

trans-unit.source: In the **Efficiency** area, view capacity efficiency information about virtual machines and virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: In the **Efficiency** area, view capacity efficiency information about virtual machines and virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: Direct Attached Storage page
trans-unit.target: Direct Attached Storage page

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Direct Attached Storage** dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to view capacity information about storage utilization, disk performance, and projected days of disk capacity.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Direct Attached Storage** dashboard in Microsoft Azure Operational Insights to view capacity information about storage utilization, disk performance, and projected days of disk capacity.

trans-unit.source: You use the **Utilization** area to view disk space usage in your virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: You use the **Utilization** area to view disk space usage in your virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Disk Performance** area to view disk throughput and latency in your virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Disk Performance** area to view disk throughput and latency in your virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the projection tool to estimate how much capacity is expected to be available for a given date range.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the projection tool to estimate how much capacity is expected to be available for a given date range.

trans-unit.source: You can view details about linked items by clicking them.
trans-unit.target: You can view details about linked items by clicking them.

trans-unit.source: You can generate an Excel workbook from this capacity information for the following categories:
trans-unit.target: You can generate an Excel workbook from this capacity information for the following categories:

trans-unit.source: Top disk space usage by host
trans-unit.target: Top disk space usage by host

trans-unit.source: Top average latency by host
trans-unit.target: Top average latency by host

trans-unit.source: The following areas are shown on the **Storage** page:
trans-unit.target: The following areas are shown on the **Storage** page:

trans-unit.source: *Utilization*: View disk space usage in your virtual machine hosts.
trans-unit.target: *Utilization*: View disk space usage in your virtual machine hosts.

trans-unit.source: *Total Disk Space*: Sum (logical disk space) for all hosts
trans-unit.target: *Total Disk Space*: Sum (logical disk space) for all hosts

trans-unit.source: *Used Disk Space*: Sum (used logical disk space) for all hosts
trans-unit.target: *Used Disk Space*: Sum (used logical disk space) for all hosts

trans-unit.source: *Available Disk Space*: Total disk space minus used disk space
trans-unit.target: *Available Disk Space*: Total disk space minus used disk space

trans-unit.source: *Percentage Disk Used*: Used disk space divided by total disk space
trans-unit.target: *Percentage Disk Used*: Used disk space divided by total disk space

trans-unit.source: *Percentage Disk Available*: Available disk space divided by total disk space
trans-unit.target: *Percentage Disk Available*: Available disk space divided by total disk space

trans-unit.source: image of Capacity Management Direct Attached Storage page
trans-unit.target: image of Capacity Management Direct Attached Storage page

trans-unit.source: Disk Performance
trans-unit.target: Disk Performance

trans-unit.source: By using Operational Insights, you can view the historical usage trend of your disk space.
trans-unit.target: By using Operational Insights, you can view the historical usage trend of your disk space.

trans-unit.source: The projection capability uses an algorithm to project future usage.
trans-unit.target: The projection capability uses an algorithm to project future usage.

trans-unit.source: For space usage in particular, the projection capability enables you to project when you might run out of disk space.
trans-unit.target: For space usage in particular, the projection capability enables you to project when you might run out of disk space.

trans-unit.source: This will help you plan proper storage and know when you need to purchase more storage.
trans-unit.target: This will help you plan proper storage and know when you need to purchase more storage.

trans-unit.source: Projection tool
trans-unit.target: Projection tool

trans-unit.source: By using the projection tool, you can view historical trends for your disk space utilization.
trans-unit.target: By using the projection tool, you can view historical trends for your disk space utilization.

trans-unit.source: The projection capability also lets you project when you are running out of disk space.
trans-unit.target: The projection capability also lets you project when you are running out of disk space.

trans-unit.source: This will help you plan proper capacity and know when you need to purchase more storage capacity.
trans-unit.target: This will help you plan proper capacity and know when you need to purchase more storage capacity.

trans-unit.source: To work with items on the Direct Attached Storage page
trans-unit.target: To work with items on the Direct Attached Storage page

trans-unit.source: On the **Direct Attached Storage** dashboard, in the **Utilization** area, you can view the disk utilization information.
trans-unit.target: On the **Direct Attached Storage** dashboard, in the **Utilization** area, you can view the disk utilization information.

trans-unit.source: Click a linked item to open it in the **Search** page and view detailed information about it.
trans-unit.target: Click a linked item to open it in the **Search** page and view detailed information about it.

trans-unit.source: In the **Disk Performance** area, you can view disk throughput and latency information.
trans-unit.target: In the **Disk Performance** area, you can view disk throughput and latency information.

trans-unit.source: In the **Projection tool**, move the date slider to display a projection of the capacity that will be used on the date you choose.
trans-unit.target: In the **Projection tool**, move the date slider to display a projection of the capacity that will be used on the date you choose.
